messages: A decision was made on your appeal on 18 December 2016. A letter with the decision will be sent to your registered address.
A hearing has been booked for your appeal.
The evidence you sent was received by us on 4 February 2017. This will be submitted to the tribunal for consideration.
The DWP have now responded to your appeal. They have not changed their original decision.
We are now in the process of booking a hearing for your appeal. We will contact you within 6 weeks to tell you when and where your hearing is.
We have notified the DWP that you want to appeal against their decision. They have until 10 January 2017 to respond. We will contact you when they have replied.
